alert.note: Alert for La Garita Mountains Above 10000 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 12 at 3:29PM MST until January 13 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST SATURDAY... ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY EVENING THROUGH MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow expected with widespread blowing snow. Total snow accumulations of up to 4 inches. Winds gusting as high as 70 mph. For the Winter Storm Watch, heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 12 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...La Garita Mountains Above 10000 Feet. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 5 PM MST Saturday. For the Winter Storm Watch, from Saturday evening through Monday morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The cold wind chills as low as 25 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
